rendered:
烋烋烋
Links: aedict | jisho | koohii | hanziyuan | kanshudo | wiktionary | purpleculture | rtega | trainchinese | bkrs | humanum | Baido | yw11 | Pleco Search | Pleco

烋字的基本解释

烋
xiāo
古同“炰”。

烋字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiū］
［《廣韻》香幽切，平幽，曉。］
见“烋烋”。
[②]［xiāo］
［《集韻》虚交切，平爻，曉。］
通“哮1”。“咻3”的被通假字。

烋字的康熙字典解释

【巳集中】【火字部】　烋； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页669第21
【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?虛交切，音虓。炰烋。見炰字註。【集韻】或作咻。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?香幽切，音飍。【玉篇】美也，福祿也，慶善也。　又【集韻】微也。　又【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?虛尤切，音休。【集韻】美也，和也，善也，通作休。　又【正韻】熏也。　又【字彙補】作?明樂平王冲?。

烋字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
烋字的起名意思

同“炰”，有咆哮之义。

boil
xiāo

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xiū］
["Guangyun" fragrant and quiet, quiet, and dawn. ]
See "hungry".
[②]［xiāo］
["Jiyun" imaginary intersection, flat line, dawn. ]
Through "wheezing 1". "Shoo 3" was passed falsely.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Collection] [Fire Word Department] 　烋; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 669 21
[Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Positive Rhyme]? Virtual intersecting, sound.炰烋. See the note to the character 炰. [Ji Yun] Or make a sound.　 [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Fragrant and quiet, sound. [Jade articles] Beauty, Fulu, Qingshan.　 [Ji Yun] Wei Ye.　 [Ji Yun] [Rhyme] [Rhyme]? Xu Youqie, sound off. 【Ji Yun】Mei Ye, He Ye, Good Ye, Tong Zuo Xiu.　[Zheng Yun] Xun Ye.　[Word Supplement] as "Ming Leping Wang Chong".
